body: So the husband finally found them, huh. Well, it's only a matter of time for the English translation and boy, do I anticipate the resolution.

I'm not trying to hate the husband for having a small dick nor do I hate the woman or the mc, the thing is the husband is just way too plain or in other words vanilla. The husband despite having a small penis could just find ways like different position, bdsm play, fetishes or stuff to kind of spice things up. I personally or even some of us could definitely relate to the mc wherein there's a woman we love or a guy we like but then again just because of some 5 years gap or so we got tossed aside, Some people might disagree or stuff but heck I don't want the girl I loved end up being taken from me, messed up I know but admit it once in your life you loved someone so much you don't want to give them up and it's just fiction so don't take it to heart too much

For those who don't know Japanese. Basically the husband is an alcoholic and because of that he fck up his job and as a result been moved to the Middle east. He doesn't even take responsibility for his action, blame it for the company order that he had no choice but to go and ask Taiki to cheer Rui up instead of talk to her himself. That makes Taiki realize that he can't leave Rui with him so he proposed. The last scene, it doesn't matter if they got caught or not since Rui already accept Taiki. The husband actually deserve it though
(Fiya)

Just to clarify - 

Netori = MC is the one stealing someone else's significant other.
Netorare = MC's significant other is the one getting stolen.

This series is Netori NOT Netorare
